survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Organic Skincare Products
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on organic skincare products to improve product offerings and customer experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of our organic skincare products?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of our organic skincare products?

questions.question_text: Which of the following organic skincare products have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clearly listed.

script.question_text: Which of the following organic skincare products have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our organic skincare products?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our organic skincare products?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our organic skincare products to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our organic skincare products to others?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing organic skincare products?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with optional open-text (radio buttons and text box)

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing organic skincare products?
